comment-text-2: 5 years developing user interfaces, with a 4-year background in front-end development and 2 years in UI/UX design. I focus on creating user-centered experiences for a wide range of products, from business and personal websites to banking, fintech, booking systems, retail, and food no-code instruments.
yoshop-case-desc: Automation of restaurant business (POS terminal, monoblock, tablet)
ronto-case-desc: IT company focused of artificial intelligence, blockchain, and virtual reality
footer-title: Always open to interesting projects, collaboration, and friendly conversation.
personal-info-desc-1: I have been designing digital products for two years now, building on my previous four years of experience in developing fintech products and SaaS solutions. This combination allows me to create interfaces that are not only aesthetically pleasing and user-friendly, but also take into account the technical possibilities of implementation.
personal-info-desc-2: My key strengths are the ability to collaborate with teams, solve complex problems based on data and feedback, and balance user needs with business goals.
personal-info-desc-3: As a designer-developer, I create interactive and technically feasible designs that simplify the development process and improve user experience.
personal-info-desc-4: Understanding the technical aspects I create thoughtful systems that can be easily expanded and adapted to future changes.
